programme.title: StarTalk Things You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Science is arround us every day. Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson takes you from novice to knowledgeable, explaining how planes fly, what makes a rainbow, why hurricanes form, and the many other fascinating wonders that make up our world.

programme.title: StarTalk Cosmic Queries
programme.desc: Join Neil deGrasse Tyson and Chuck as they talk about the Fermi Paradox, dinosaurs versus aliens, and more.

programme.title: StarTalk Cosmic Queries
programme.desc: A Cambridge historian joins Neil deGrasse Tyson and Matt to explore the science and history of medieval times.

programme.title: StarTalk Cosmic Queries
programme.sub-title: StarTalk Cosmic Queries Season 3 mini marathon
programme.desc: You have questions, they have responses. Renowned astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and other top science minds take on fan questions about life and the universe. Uncover a new mind-bending topic each season, from space and physics to nature and more.

programme.title: StarTalk with Neil deGrasse Tyson
programme.sub-title: StarTalk with Neil deGrasse Tyson Season 2 Mini-Marathon Pt II
programme.desc: Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and an extraordinary lineup of top field experts dive deep into unique realms of science. Join them for thought-provoking discussions about the theories, discoveries, and phenomena that matter most to us all.
